pageContext.claim: “The Heritage Foundation came out with a report, and this was as of two months ago. We've already implemented 64 percent of our top agenda items. And that's at a much faster pace than even Ronald Reagan.”
pageContext.analysis: The conservative Heritage Foundation said Trump had "embraced" 64 percent of its 334 policy recommendations. This isn't the same as saying Trump had "implemented" 64 percent of his own agenda, as he implied. Some of these recommendations are quite vague, such as "reforming government agencies." Moreover, Heritage specifically gave credit to Reagan for following their recommendations in its announcement about Trump. As of July, the president had broken or failed to deliver on many of his campaign promises, according to our Trump Promise Tracker.
